structure.unit: COLLECTION OF PUBLIC CLAIMS BY ACTION

law.history: Repealed 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. IV, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4281t-3, 4281t-5, 4281t-6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Manner of filing claims; proof; notice of disposition; appeal.
